attributes.additional_details:
To control the spread of coronavirus :
1) please put temporary travel ban from and to all countries 
2) Please do proper screening of people returning from abroad that includes body temperature & throat swab
3) please do not ask people to 'self-isolate' as they will end up spreading the virus more. Kindly use  facilities to quarantine in remote locations
attributes.background: Request for -- Airport Checks, Travel Ban & Remote Quarantine

rejection.details:
Travel ban: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300932
Screening: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301188

Please note we can't accept petitions about clinical decisions.
